Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.AliasTip.Value
Item.Value: If you use mailbox alias to receive support messages, please specify alias address

Item.Name: LocalizableStrings.MessageLanguageTip.Value
Item.Value: The message language is determined by the following values, from highest to lowest priority: 1. The preferred language of the recipient contact. 2. The mailbox language in the “List of mailboxes for case registration” lookup. 3. The value of the “Default language for messages” (“DefaultMessageLanguage” code) system setting. Saber mais about this feature in the {0}Academy{1}
